articles.title: Here is Lego’s official Nintendo Game Boy — with lenticular display
articles.description: We asked for the perfect Lego Nintendo Game Boy… did Lego deliver? After revealing this January that it would take up the challenge, it has revealed a most impressive take on the 1989 classic that’ll cost a relatively reasonable $60 in the US. It’s already up for pre-order today for an October 1st ship date. […]
articles.author: Sean Hollister
